name: Artistic Circle
description:
Artistic Circle is a game about... well... a circle! With a mustache!

Avoid getting touched by other evil shapes and defeat them by drawing them!
Every destroyed shape increases your score by one.

Controls

- mouse only

- draw straight lines to fling your circle in the drawn direction

- draw shapes to defeat the nearest shape on screen

- draw a simple lightning bolt shape to erase all shapes on screen at the cost of 5 score points
